name: Intel Core i5-12400F
description: The Intel Core i5-12400F is a 6-core, 12-thread processor based on Intel's Alder Lake architecture. It features a base clock speed of 2.5 GHz and a boost clock speed of up to 4.4 GHz. It has 18 MB of Intel Smart Cache and supports DDR4-3200 memory. The i5-12400F is a great option for budget-minded gamers and content creators who need good performance for everyday tasks and light gaming.
